about.title: About Us
about.intro: Construction company "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. is a limited liability company with one hundred percent private capital, registered at the end of 2007.
about.description: The company performs construction, reconstruction, rehabilitation and modernization of existing buildings, construction of transport and energy infrastructure, landscaping infrastructure, hydraulic construction and environmental protection, as well as warranty and post-warranty maintenance of facilities.
about.registry: Since 2008, the company has been registered in the Central Professional Register of Builders under the Law of the Chamber of Builders in Bulgaria and executes construction projects in all five construction groups.

services.title: Activities
services.intro: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. performs all types of construction and installation works according to the needs of investors:
items: Construction of reinforced concrete and metal structures
Roofing systems, hydro, thermal and sound insulation
services.footer: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. possesses a wide range of specialized construction machinery and construction assets necessary for the operation of any construction company.

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro: Since its establishment, "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. has participated in various public procurement projects in the field of construction, financed by international institutions, state and private investors.
projects.classified: The company has experience in executing special public procurement contracts regulated according to the Classified Information Protection Act.

clients.title: Clients
clients.intro: The key to the company's success is putting the client's needs first.
clients.partnership: In partnership with subcontractors and suppliers, "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. offers solutions that fully meet the clients' wishes. The company works with materials and equipment of proven quality from leading Bulgarian and international manufacturers.
clients.technology: In the implementation of projects, the company applies all modern technologies and materials established in European construction practice, striving to satisfy the highest client requirements regarding quality and price.
clients.financial: "Techno Stroy Bulgaria" Ltd. maintains stable relationships with financial institutions, which allows the company to be a stable partner in every investment project.
clients.relationships: The company values its clients and builds partnership relationships with them, striving to find flexible and individual solutions for each of them, professionally and responsibly executing projects with quality and on time.
clients.types: Among the clients are both private investment companies and large state enterprises.

map.title: Our Clients
map.description: Technostroy has completed construction projects in over {count} regions across the country, partnering with state institutions, municipalities and private investors.

hero.intro: Since 2008, Techno Stroy Bulgaria Ltd. has been operating in accordance with international standards for quality, environment, and safety.
hero.description: The company's policy is focused on improving the quality management system to increase customer satisfaction by fully meeting their requirements.

practices.title: Quality Management Methods
items: Implementation of new modern technologies for construction work
Application of practices for effective human resources management
Timely and quality execution of contracted construction works
Successful implementation of internal quality control
Adoption and application of new modern technologies and materials
practices.footer: The company's policy is focused on commitment to sustainable economic development, fair labor relations with workers, protection from discrimination, compliance with regulatory requirements for healthy and safe working conditions, and environmental protection.
